scenes.description: MC section where Tsunomaki Watame reflects on the past year, mentioning her streams, guest appearances, and new songs.
Tsunomaki Watame performs her original song 'My song'.

subtitles.original: この１年、どんな年だったかな？
subtitles.english: This past year, what kind of year was it?

subtitles.original: わためはね、とにかく、あっという間だったかなー。
subtitles.english: For Watame, anyway, it felt like it went by in a flash.

subtitles.original: いろんな人の、歌のライブゲストにも出させてもらったり...
subtitles.english: I got to appear as a guest in various people's singing lives...

subtitles.original: 今年のわための記念配信にも、
subtitles.english: And for my own commemorative streams this year,

subtitles.original: いろんなたくさんのホロメンを呼べてね、とっても嬉しかったし、楽しかった、そんな１年だったな気がします。
subtitles.english: I was able to invite many Holo-members, which made me very happy and it was a fun year like that.

subtitles.original: あとはね、いろんな、企画？ギリギリわるくないわためとか...
subtitles.english: Also, various projects? Like "Giri Giri Warukunai Watame"...

subtitles.original: あと、角巻わための「Have a Nice Day」とか、企画とかに挑戦したり...
subtitles.english: And Tsunomaki Watame's "Have a Nice Day", taking on challenges like those projects...

subtitles.original: あとは今年もね、たくさん配信したし、
subtitles.english: And also, I streamed a lot this year,

subtitles.original: もう何より、駆け抜けた１年だったなと思います。
subtitles.english: and more than anything, I think it was a year of running through it all.

subtitles.original: ずっとね、わためいとのみんなと一緒だったから、
subtitles.english: Since I was with all the Watamates the whole time,

subtitles.original: 本当に楽しかったよ。泣いちゃうよー。
subtitles.english: it was really fun. I'm gonna cry.

subtitles.original: わためいともそう思ってくれてると嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if the Watamates feel the same way.

subtitles.original: いや、コメントでもね、「あっという間だった」とか、
subtitles.english: Looking at the comments, "it went by in a flash" and

subtitles.original: ハートとかもね、いっぱい送ってくれてるけど、やっぱそうだよね。
subtitles.english: lots of hearts being sent, yeah, that's right.

subtitles.original: 今年、あっという間だったよね。
subtitles.english: This year really went by in a flash, didn't it?

subtitles.original: 今年は、オリ曲も、去年ほどじゃなかったけど...
subtitles.english: This year, original songs weren't as many as last year, but...

subtitles.original: あの、なな、なんだっけ...なんだっけ...
subtitles.english: Um... what was it... what was it...

subtitles.original: もう、涙をこらえるので精一杯で、曲名が出てこないよー。
subtitles.english: I'm so busy holding back tears that I can't remember the song titles!

subtitles.original: あ、夢見る羊とか、君色ハナミズキとか、
subtitles.english: Ah, "Yumemiru Hitsuji", "Kimiiro Hanamizuki",

subtitles.original: あとは、カリちゃんとのね、ラップ２バージョンとか、もう４曲ほど、５曲ほどかな？作れて。
subtitles.english: and the two rap versions with Calli-chan... I was able to make about 4 or 5 songs.

subtitles.original: 本当みんなのおかげです。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: It's really all thanks to everyone. Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 英語のラップにもね、頑張って、「もう、やだ、無理」って言いながら挑戦したり...
subtitles.english: Even with English rap, I worked hard and took it on while saying "I hate this, I can't do it"...

subtitles.original: 作詞も、何曲か書かせていただいたり、
subtitles.english: I also got to write the lyrics for several songs,

subtitles.original: 挑戦の年だったなと思います。
subtitles.english: so I think it was a year of challenges.

subtitles.original: この３年間、駆け抜けてきたけど...
subtitles.english: I've been running through these past three years...

subtitles.original: まだまだ、叶えたい夢や、
subtitles.english: But there are still so many dreams I want to fulfill and

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒にやりたいこととかも、たくさんあるから...
subtitles.english: things I want to do together with everyone...

subtitles.original: これからも、挑戦を続けていくという気持ちを込めて、歌いたいと思います。
subtitles.english: So, with the feeling of continuing to take on challenges, I'd like to sing.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください、My song。
subtitles.english: Please listen, "My song".

subtitles.original: My song
subtitles.english: My song

subtitles.original: 手にしたもの以外が 綺麗に見えた
subtitles.english: Things other than what I held looked beautiful

subtitles.original: どうせこんなもんかと 口癖だった
subtitles.english: I used to say, "I guess it's just like this"

subtitles.original: 薄ら笑いばかりが 得意になった
subtitles.english: I became good at only thin smiles

subtitles.original: けど 一番笑えるのは このプライドだ
subtitles.english: But the funniest thing is this pride

subtitles.original: 一生懸命なんか 全部無駄だったんだ
subtitles.english: Everything I did with all my might was all in vain

subtitles.original: ああ もう嫌になった
subtitles.english: Ah, I've had enough

subtitles.original: 逃げたくないって聴こえた これは僕の声
subtitles.english: I heard a voice saying "I don't want to run away", it's my own voice

subtitles.original: 1回 10回 100回 1000回 挑戦は続けるや まだ足りない
subtitles.english: 1 time, 10 times, 100 times, 1000 times, I'll keep challenging, it's still not enough

subtitles.original: 手放してる やまない雨の中
subtitles.english: Letting go, in the never-ending rain

subtitles.original: ずっと考えて 考えて 考えて 見つけだせ 僕だけの正解を
subtitles.english: Think, think, think constantly, and find it, my own answer

subtitles.original: 証明したいんだよな そうだろう
subtitles.english: I want to prove it, right?

subtitles.original: そうだろう
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original: 焦り上がる心拍数に 嘘つくように
subtitles.english: As if to lie to the racing heart rate

subtitles.original: 自分を落ち着ける 皮肉はいらない
subtitles.english: To calm myself down, I don't need irony

subtitles.original: それも昂揚感に 置き換えたらさ
subtitles.english: If I replace even that with excitement

subtitles.original: 今日もまた 挑むべきハードルが ほら 見えただろう
subtitles.english: Today again, look, you can see the hurdles I should challenge

subtitles.original: 葛藤の隙間まで 錆びない生命を
subtitles.english: To the gaps of conflict, a life that doesn't rust

subtitles.original: 捻り出せるか
subtitles.english: Can I wring it out?

subtitles.original: 出ないのなら とっくに諦めてるよ
subtitles.english: If I couldn't, I would have given up long ago

subtitles.original: 渾身の信念で 歌ったって 届くわけじゃない
subtitles.english: Even if I sing with my whole heart and belief, it's not like it'll reach

subtitles.original: 素晴らしいかい 僕らの現実は残酷だ
subtitles.english: Is it wonderful? Our reality is cruel

subtitles.original: 曖昧を削り取って 尖らせ また歌って
subtitles.english: Scrape off the ambiguity, sharpen it, and sing again

subtitles.original: 諦める くらいなら 過去に捨ててきた
subtitles.english: If I were to give up, I would have left it in the past

subtitles.original: 愛してたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to love

subtitles.original: 愛してたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to love

subtitles.original: 立ち止まるたびに進みたがる足を まだ行こう
subtitles.english: With my legs that want to move forward every time I stop, let's keep going
